briefTitle: Fear of Cancer Recurrence (FoR) Trajectory During Radiation Treatment
officialTitle: Fear of Cancer Recurrence (FoR) Trajectory During Radiation Treatment and Follow-up Into Survivorship of 100 Breast Cancer patients-a Pilot Study
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Female patient who are diagnosed with breast cancer, age 18+

Exclusion Criteria:

* Under 18 years old
* Male
* Known psychiatric illness
* Receiving palliative radiotherapy (non-curative)
* Unable to communicate in English
